 2018-12832018-10-17,  ,  INFC,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisAppointment of SANDRA MARTEL of La Prairie, Quebec, to be Chief Executive Officer of The Jacques-Cartier and Champlain Bridges Inc., to hold office during pleasure for a term of seven months, or until such time as a new Chief Executive Officer is appointed, whichever occurs first, effective October 20, 2018.
